lead_paragraph: Rock star DAVID ESSEX (top 10 hit for ROCK ON and star of the cult classic films THAT'LL BE THE DAY, STARDUST) and three time Emmy Award winner BEAU BRIDGES (THE LANDLORD, THE INCIDENT, TWO MINUTE WARNING) star as rival motorbike racers in this adve
snippet: Rock star DAVID ESSEX (top 10 hit for ROCK ON and star of the cult classic films THAT'LL BE THE DAY, STARDUST) and three time Emmy Award winner BEAU BRIDGES (THE LANDLORD, THE INCIDENT, TWO MINUTE WARNING) star as rival motorbike racers in this adve
